Query.Sql: with results as ( select distinct (select top 1 PatientId from omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics d where d.PatientSer = dc.PatientSer) as PatientId, dc.DiagnosisCode, dc.Start_date as event_start_date, dc.End_date as event_end_date from omop_staging.RTDS_5_Diagnosis_Course dc where dc.DiagnosisTableName = 'ICD-10' ) select PatientId, DiagnosisCode, event_start_date, event_end_date from results where PatientId is not null and patientid not like '%[^0-9]%';
